Title: Take steel as the key link, make a leap forward in all fields
Designer: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: Steel workers lead the parade, carrying the flag with the traditional character 鋼 (simplified 钢 - steel), other sectors of industry and agriculture follow.
